I would recommend "Get Him to the Greek." This movie follows a record company intern who is hired to accompany a British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater. This movie has received positive reviews and is considered one of the best comedy movies of all time.
In addition, I would also recommend "The Karate Kid." This classic movie tells the story of a young boy named Daniel who moves from New Jersey to Los Angeles. At his new school, Daniel meets the strong-willed martial arts student, Mr. Miyagi. Miyagi is secretly a blackbelt martial artist and he senses that Daniel has potential in learning karate.  In this classic movie, Miyagi trains Daniel to become a skilled martial artist who can defend himself against bullies or other threats.
Overall, both "Get Him to the Greek" and "The Karate Kid" are highly recommended movies for fans of comedy and action movies.
